START.name: an unfamiliar room.
START.desc: You are not sure how you got there. There is a large white door, but it is boarded up. There are doors to the NORTH and the SOUTH. Please enter a direction.

LOC2.name: the Kitchen.
LOC2.desc: There is a letter on the table. There is a large window looking into the backyard, where there are lots of trees. There are doors to your EAST and WEST. you began in the SOUTH. you can READ the letter.

LOC3.name: the Living Room.
LOC3.desc: You can see that there are scratch marks all over the furniture. There is a small table with a single drawer, a broken TV set, and a chair without cushions. There is also a tall dark cabinet. You may OPEN the drawer. You may also EXPLORE the cabinet. you came from the NORTH.

LOC4.name: the Bedroom.
LOC4.desc: There is a bed on the far wall covered in with a dirty, white blanket. There is a desk and a bedside table. The desk is covered in scratch marks. The bedside table has a single drawer. You may OPEN the drawer. you came from the EAST.

LOC5.name: the Kitchen.
LOC5.desc: The letter reads as follows: If you follow the path through the front yard, you will find a vehicle .5 miles away from the property. The key is hidden. Do not let Him find it. Beware of the basement. If He wakes up, you may not have time to escape. Good Luck. - you may CLOSE the letter.

LOC6.name: The Bedroom.
LOC6.desc: There is a bed on the far wall covered with a dirty, white blanket. There is a desk and a bedside table. The desk is covered in scratch marks. The bedside table has a single drawer. You hear a growl. You need to find the key, soon. you may OPEN the drawer. you came from the EAST.

LOC7.name: the Basement.
LOC7.desc: You hear a low growl from the bottom of the steps. You should CLOSE the door.

LOC8.name: the Kitchen.
LOC8.desc: You may have awakened something. You should be careful, now. The basement door is to the EAST. there is another door to the WEST. you began in the SOUTH. you can still READ the letter.

LOC9.name: the Bedroom.
LOC9.desc: The drawer is mostly empty. You know that there is another drawer in the living room. you may CLOSE the drawer.

LOC10.name: the Living Room.
LOC10.desc: You found a key! You decide to take the key and find your escape route. you may CLOSE the drawer.

LOC11.name: the Living Room.
LOC11.desc: You should exit through the white door to the EAST, which leads outside. Hurry, before something finds you.

LOC12.name: the yard.
LOC12.desc: You can see a vehicle in the distance. There is a growl behind you! You should RUN!

LOC14.name: the clear!
LOC14.desc: You made it! You may QUIT the game.

LOC13.name: the Living Room.
LOC13.desc: You can see that there are scratch marks all over the furniture. There is a small table with a single drawer, a broken TV set, and a chair without cushions. There are no obvious clues in this room. you came from the NORTH.

LOC15.name: an unfamiliar room.
LOC15.desc: There is a large white door, but it is boarded up. The kitchen is to the NORTH. the living room is to the SOUTH.

LOC16.name: the Living Room.
LOC16.desc: When you open the cabinet door, a row of glass plates tumble out onto the floor and shatter. The noise draws a mysterious creature into the room. You should RUN.

LOC17.name: the Living Room.
LOC17.desc: As you try to escape, the creature decides you look awfully tasty. You have been eaten. You must QUIT the game.
